page.title: 08HOME LIFE THE GOOD SIDE
page.content: We all live in families mostly with Mum, Dad and 2 or 3 children. Most of us have our own room or share with one other. We use it as a bedroom, and a playroom and work room. Usually the family has an eveving meal together either in the kitchen or the living room. Breakfast is a rush with people going to work or school so we eat at different times. Midday meal is either at school or a quick bite. Most days the family gets together to chat, watch T.V., play games like monopoly or go out for days or family visits. We do some jobs around the house, play with friends or amuse ourselves. We read, draw, play electronic games, make models with construction sets, play with the computer.
